data.title: Suspiria (1977)

data.text:
This article is about the the 1977 film. For the 2018 film of the same name, see Suspiria (2018).

Suspiria is a 1977 Italian supernatural horror film directed by Dario Argento. The cast of the film consists of Jessica Harper, Stefania Casini, Flavio Bucci, Miguel Bosé, Barbara Magnolfi, Susanna Javicoli, Eva Axén, Alida Valli, and Joan Bennett.

The film spawned two sequels, Inferno and The Mother of Tears, completing The Three Mothers trilogy, as well as a 2018 remake.
